General.Name: Anhui Jinhe Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Anhui Jinhe Industrial Co.,Ltd. engages in the chemicals business in China. It focuses on the research and development, production, and sale of food additives, bulk chemicals, pharmaceutical intermediates, and functional chemicals and intermediates. The company offers food additive products include sweeteners and flavoring products for use in beverages, snacks, canned food, preserved food, candied fruit, preserved fruit, and fruit cake; acesulfame potassium and sucralose; spice products comprise methyl, ethyl maltol, methyl cyclopentenolone, and glucosyl steviol glycosides; maltol, methyl acetoacetate, 2-(chloromethyl)-3,4-dimethoxypyridine hydrochloride for use in medicine and health field; and ammonium bicarbonate, ammonium chloride, and ammonia water for use in agricultural environmental protection. It provides bulk chemicals, including liquid ammonia, hydrogen peroxide, melamine, formic acid, formaldehyde, sulfuric acid, sulfur dioxide, sulfur trioxide, nitric acid, ethyl chloride, and methyl chloride; and functional chemicals and intermediates comprising pentaerythritol, dipentaerythritol, sodium formate, neopentyl glycol used to produce high-grade coatings, resins, advanced lubricants, plasticizers, surfactants, insulating materials, etc. In addition, the company's products are used in food and beverage, daily consumption, medicine and health, agricultural environmental protection, and manufacturing industries. Anhui Jinhe Industrial Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Chuzhou, the People's Republic of China.

6.Name: Mr. Qingyuan  Sun
6.Title: Non-Independent Director and Deputy Gen. Mang.
